---
name: "New song submission"
about: Add a new song markdown
title: "Add: <Song Title> - <Artist>"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

Provide:
- [ ] `content/songs/<id>.md` with frontmatter (title, artist, key, capo, tags)
- [ ] Optional `youtube_id` and `scroll_map`
- [ ] Run `npm run content:build`
